Description: Core-CustomerGateway Template. This template creates a Customer Gateway. Use this when multiple VPNs are needed to the same CustomerGateway from VPCs in the same Account.

CustomerGatewayName.Description: Name of the CustomerGateway, usually the location.
CustomerGatewayName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with an upper case letter and contain upper and lower case letters and numbers, or a hyphen.

CustomerGatewayBgpAsn.Description: Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the Customer Gateway
CustomerGatewayBgpAsn.ConstraintDescription: must be a number between 60000 and 65000. Use 65000 for static routing without BGP.

CustomerGatewayIpAddress.Description: IP Address of the Customer Gateway
CustomerGatewayIpAddress.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP address of the form X.X.X.X.
